text: Venstre 1945 election material ("Venstre has good cards to hand") Folketing elections were held alongside Landsting elections in Denmark on 30 October 1945,Dieter Nohlen & Philip Stöver (2010) Elections in Europe: A data handbook, p524 except in the Faroe Islands where they were held on 20 November. The Social Democratic Party remained the largest in the Folketing, with 48 of the 149 seats. Voter turnout was 86.3% in Denmark proper and 57.3% in the Faroes.Nohlen & Stöver, p540 ==Results== ===Denmark=== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:right !Party !Votes !% !Seats !+/– |- |align=left|Social Democratic Party||671,755||32.8||48||–18 |- |align=left|Venstre||479,158||23.4||38||+10 |- |align=left|Conservative People's Party||373,688||18.2||26||–5 |- |align=left|Communist Party of Denmark||255,236||12.5||18||New |- |align=left|Danish Social Liberal Party||167,073||8.1||11||–2 |- |align=left|Danish Unity||63,760||3.1||4||+1 |- |align=left|Justice Party of Denmark||38,459||1.9||3||+1 |- |align=left|Independents||55||0.0||0||0 |- |align=left|Invalid/blank votes||6,131||–||–||– |- |align=left|Total||2,055,315||100||148||0 |- |align=left colspan=5|Source: Nohlen & Stöver |} ===Faroe Islands=== {| class=wikitable style=text-align:right !Party !Votes !% !Seats !+/– |- |align=left|Independent (People's Party)||3,990||46.2||1||0 |- |align=left|Social Democratic Party-Self-Government Party||2,521||29.2||0||0 |- |align=left|Independent (Union Party)||2,127||24.6||0||0 |- |align=left|Invalid/blank votes||12||–||–||– |- |align=left|Total||8,650||100||1||0 |- |align=left colspan=5|Source: Nohlen & Stöver |} ==References== Category:Elections in Denmark Category:1945 elections in Europe Category:1945 in Denmark Category:October 1945 events
title: 1945 Danish Folketing election
